resources.string: CREATE TABLE netprofile (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, jitter INTEGER, loss INTEGER, udp TEXT, tcp TEXT, down TEXT, up TEXT, network_type TEXT, endpoint_type TEXT, date DATETIME NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE user (id TEXT NOT NULL UNIQUE )

CREATE TABLE t_localexecution (profileid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, methodname TEXT, classname TEXT, inputsize INTEGER, outputsize INTEGER, profilehash INTEGER, localprocesstime INTEGER)
CREATE TABLE t_remoteexecution (remoteid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, profileid INTEGER, serverurl TEXT, remoteprocesstime INTEGER)

CREATE TABLE t_logdecision ( logid INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, profileid INTEGER, remoteid INTEGER, profilehash INTEGER, serverurl TEXT, conntype TEXT, executionndate DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, executiontime INTEGER, executiondecision INTEGER )
